resources.string: Welcome to the U-Stalls App. By using this app, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.

Eligibility: Only authorized stall operators from the University of Pangasinan can create and manage a stall account.\n Account Credentials: Each stall is assigned a predetermined account and password. You are responsible for keeping this information secure.\n Account Management: Stall operators can update their menu, inventory, and prices. All information must be accurate and up-to-date.

Order Confirmation: Orders must be confirmed before submission and cannot be canceled or modified once submitted.\n Right to Cancel: U-Stalls may cancel orders due to unavailability or unforeseen circumstances. Affected users will be notified.

Payment Methods: Payments are processed through GCash and Maya. Stall operators must keep their payment details accurate. Pricing: Stall operators set prices, which may change without prior notice. Refunds: Payments are non-refundable, except for incorrect or unavailable items.

Inventory and Management: Stall operators are responsible for maintaining accurate inventory levels and menu updates. Compliance: Operators must adhere to all university policies on food safety and hygiene.

App Usage: U-Stalls may modify or discontinue the app at any time without notice. Termination: Accounts violating these terms may be suspended or terminated. Updates: Terms may be updated; continued use of the app signifies acceptance of changes.
By using the U-Stalls App, you agree to these terms and conditions. Thank you for using U-Stalls!
